title: Nokia says German court rules in its favour in Amazon patent dispute
description: In a statement, Nokia's Chief Licensing Officer Arvin Patel said the Munich Regional Court ruled Amazon was using "Nokia's patented video-related technologies in its end-user streaming devices and is selling them illegally without a licence".
content: A German court has ruled that Amazon is using Nokia's patented video technologies without a licence, the Finnish network equipment maker and telecommunications patent holder said on Friday.
cleaned_content: a german court has ruled that amazon is using nokias patented video technologies without a licence the finnish network equipment maker and telecommunications patent holder said on friday
